name: Helen Ficalora Necklace - Chain
description:
Celebrity jewelry designer, Helen Ficalora, created this beautiful handcrafted sterling silver charm, inspired by the work of Water-Thirst. Helen is graciously donating 100% of the proceeds from the sales of this charm to bring clean water solutions to Africa. For every 50 necklaces sold, an entire water well can be built.  This makes all the difference in the world to people like Doreen.  Forced out of her home by a civil dispute, Doreen is grateful to have a clean water source for her children. With this simple and elegant fashion statement you can provide water to more people like Doreen.

Helen Ficalora had been featured in a array of television shows, movies and magazines including The Ellen Degeneres Show, Harper’s Bazaar, InStyle, Glamour, Cosmopolitan and Real Simple.

name: Speak Hope Tote
description:
designed by Dowdy Studio. this bag is perfect for traveling to the beach, picking up groceries or your everyday everything bag. natural canvas. screen printed by Printed threads

Married couple, Dylan and Pamela Dowdy, are the artist duo behind Dowdy Studio and the Dowdy Studio Wagon, Dallas' first mobile art shop. Together they design, illustrate and handmake everything in their shop, from quirky screenprinted tees, pillows and bags, to graphic wooden jewelry, art prints, clocks, and more. All their artwork features their own hand-drawn illustrations, like the Lumberjack Mer Man (the unemployed lumberjack of the sea) and Grand Whale (an irregular hybrid of a musical whale and a grand piano). The dynamic duo pop up in their Dowdy Studio Wagon in a variety of restaurants, local venues, festivals and events in the DFW area and beyond. The two artists enjoy meeting great people in great places, sharing their passion for independent art and design with others.

name: Lash Allure
description: After successful involvement in our most recent fundraising event, Lash Allure has donated a limited number of their product to sell for the 100% benefit of Water-Thirst’s major projects. As a respected voice in the Fashion community, Lash Allure’s products are top of the line, and we value their partnership for the cause. It’s a beauty solution you can feel good about.
